CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(Business_Unit__c), "APPS; DPS; Advisory; BD; Biometrics; ", IF(INCLUDES(Business_Unit__c, "APPS"), "APPS; ", "") & IF(INCLUDES(Business_Unit__c, "DPS"), "DPS; ", "") & IF(INCLUDES(Business_Unit__c, "Advisory"), "Advisory; ", "") & IF(INCLUDES(Business_Unit__c, "BD"), "BD; ", "") & IF(INCLUDES(Business_Unit__c, "Biometrics"), "Biometrics; ", ""))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: formula field for multi select PL Business Unit. This will be used for component/ section visibility on dynamic forms.
CustomField.label: Business Unit Filter
